title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in to their account. They've tried resetting their password multiple times but still...

title: Payment Gateway Error on Checkout
description: User is getting a 404 error after submitting payment details. Happens with both Visa and Mastercard.

title: Broken Link on Contact Page
description: The 'Submit Request' button on the contact us page is not clickable, preventing support requests.

title: Data Sync Failure on Mobile App
description: Mobile app data does not sync with the cloud server upon opening. Requires manual refresh.

title: Typo in Email Template
description: Automated welcome email contains a grammatical error in the third paragraph. Requires urgent correction.

title: Server Downtime - Database Unresponsive
description: All API endpoints are failing with a 503 error. Root cause appears to be database connection pool exhaustion.

title: Slow Loading Time on Dashboard
description: The main user dashboard takes over 10 seconds to load. Performance regression detected after latest deployment.

title: Feature Request: Export to CSV
description: Customer needs the ability to export their historical transaction data into a downloadable CSV file.

title: Missing Translation for German Users
description: Several key navigation elements still appear in English for users who have selected German as their language.

title: Security Vulnerability Found (XSS)
description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability was reported on the user profile editing page via input sanitization.
